Audio.Locality: Parque Estatal Carlos Botelho, Sao Paulo state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a single bird along powerline cut near visitor's center (10-20m up). Many mobbing birds. Interestingly, the song of this taxon is nearly identical to that of G. sanchezi. Image here http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/3876570333/
